segments.text: Have you ever worked as a tour guide ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a little experience . I guided a few foreign tourists around Beijing last year as a part-time job . I showed them to the Great Wall , the Imperial Palace , and the Summer Palace .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you may know that it's hard work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know . A friend of mine is a guide . He talked with me about his work , but I don't mind working hard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you applied with any other companies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there anything you want to ask about ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to be an overseas tour guide someday . Would there ever be any chance of that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . There'll be a good chance of that if you work for this company . Not right away , of course , but in a few years , after you learn more about our business , you may go overseas with a tour group . Any questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . When can I get the decision ? I hope you can give me a definite answer as soon as possible . If I'd turned down , I ll have to secure a position elsewhere .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , then . We'll get in touch with you within a week . Thank you for coming today , Mr . Sun .
segments.speaker: S1
